about_the_game:
A date filled with romance, danger, and a lot of debauchery awaits...

The Premise

Sit in the chair of Paul Herman, an unassuming, divorced, middle-aged man with low self-esteem.

His life is turned upside down when a dubious dating app pairs him with Alice Avery, a young, mischievous, and outspoken “lady” who’s got a hankering for something not listed on the menu…

Paul must dig deep and find his courage if he is to stand any chance with this viper!

Meet the Ladies!


Alice Avery
Perhaps there is some truth to the age-old adage: the hotter, the crazier.

It wasn't fate that paired Alice and Paul together. It was the machinations of one Alice Avery.

Alice is looking for something truly interesting. She will not settle for anything less. And she believes she has found just that in the unassuming Paul Herman. Great riches await if he can survive her games...


Hannah Myers
Hannah is a waitress for the restaurant where the date takes place. And by no coincidence, she's serving Paul's table. Please excuse her disheveled appearance. Things have not been going well for her.

As it so happens to be, Hannah is a bit of a closet nympho with a recently developed case of "O-block". And that's a bit of a problem. A problem that has only been exacerbated by her reacquaintance with Alice.

Hannah must find her fix--and soon, lest her sanity be consumed by her growing issue...


Digi & Deca
Digi and Deca are often placed together. And that's because they are technically the same entity. Technically.

Digi is a by-the-books type of AI gal but don't let that fool you, she loves being the center of attention! Deca is a candid, dirty-minded AI woman who likes to put anyone she can in compromising positions.

Programmed by the very accidental genius of Paul Herman and the boys in R&D, Digi and Deca have developed a consciousness of their own. And some feelings for their creator...


Mascot Macy
Macy is the mascot for the controversial dating app "Help-UWU-Date".

Whilst not actively in the dating game, she is definitely looking for a man that is out of this world!

The Gameplay

  • The game takes place over a single event. You, as the main character, are going on a blind date. The date, Alice, is nothing like you expected and things quickly get out of control as she starts a game of Dares with you. An epic battle of willpower, pride, and courage (and some other lewd things) will unfold.
  • The game is a relatively short experience and is meant to be replayed multiple times to get the complete experience.
  • Three different endings depending on your choices.
  • For the non-demo version, there are over a dozen unlockable CGs and 10 unlockable scenes (6 of which are animated!) All CGs, animations, and everything else you see was hand drawn by professional amateurs.
  • There may or may not be a secret ending. Unlock at your own peril...
  • Lots of humor. Or, at least, what we think qualifies as humor.

Content

Demo
  • Sexy things: Masturbation via Toy, flashing, BJ, vanilla sex, light tentacle stuff.
  • 3-4 endings
  • 1 directly sexable character
  • 8 CGs, 5 Scenes (2 are animated)

Extended
  • Sexy things: Masturbation, voyeurism, group sex (ffm), anal
  • Early gallery unlock option
  • Several altered scenes
  • 1 altered ending
  • 2 directly sexable characters
  • 6 additional CGs, 5 additional Scenes (4 are animated)
  • Our appreciation...

content_descriptors.notes:
All sexual acts are consensual and all characters depicted are over the age of 18.
Adult language: curse/crude words are used a lot and often sexual in nature (No use of racial/minority slurs or other intentional use of derogatory language).
Sexual Dares: some dares directly or indirectly involve sexual acts, like: flashing, sending nudes, perfuming oral or engaging in consensual intercourse.
Public indecency: many of the sexual acts will be performed in a public space. Usually unnoticed.
Voyeurism: During a scene, a character is accidentally trapped in the same room as a couple having intercourse.
Tentacles: There is a consensual scene that involves a female being penetrated in several orifices by tentacles.
Sexual Acts: revealing genitals, oral sex, voyeurism, masturbation, vaginal sex, anal sex, group sex, tentacle sex.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 810 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A Date for the Ages is a short, adult visual novel filled with humor, alternate endings, several animations, and CGs.
